metadata.title: CVE-2021-46179 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Reachable Assertion vulnerability in upx before 4.0.0 allows attackers tocause a denial of service via crafted file passed to the the readxfunction.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
